author: The Associated Press
title: Shakopee prison fence under construction
text:
Home / Brief / Shakopee prison fence under construction Shakopee prison fence under construction By: The Associated Press September 28, 2015 4:37 pm 0 Construction has started on a secure fence around the only Minnesota prison that doesn’t have one. The new fence at the Shakopee women’s prison has its supporters and its opponents. Resident Gene Pottheier says his family has lived near the prison for 30 years and has never had safety concerns.
